message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 99.99% and you get 0.01%.  Let's see if we can work something out.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's split the money evenly this time.  I'm sure we can find a better solution than the last two rounds.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think I should get the majority
Let's just split it down the middle. I'm tired of this back and forth. We're both losing money with each round.
I'm getting closer to my target, but still willing to compromise
We're running out of time. I think this is the best we can do. Let's just accept it and move on.
